messages.message:
Hi. Who is best placed to help answer the following RFI questions? This is for the HSBC Global Reconciliations use case, but appear rather use case agnostic questions.

• Please describe any in-built application logging, monitoring and alerting features of the product.
• Does the product provide scripts for automated deployments?
• Do you provide a yearly SOC Report?
• Please describe any Backout capability available for the solution.
• What is the notice period for any planned version demises?
@Theo Jungeblut Are you able to help with any of these please?
